		Question: where is harvard university
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is:
Harvard University is located in Cambridge, Massachusetts, in the United States. The university is in the New England region of the US. It is about 3 miles (5 km) from Boston and 210 miles (340 km) from New York City. It is about 400 miles (640 km) away from Washington, D.C. The coordinates of the school are 42.3741° N,
